saao/saa15/P313492
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-e-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x x x ni x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ma-a-dak-tu x x x x x šu-u₂ a-x x x x x x a-šap-par x x x x x x LUGAL be-li₂ x x x x x x a-na-ku e-pa-aš₂ x x x x TA@v pa-ni x+x x x x x ṭe₃-en-šu x x x x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {ŠE}IN.NU la-aš₂-pur-ak-ka ma-a x x x 01 qa {ŠE}IN.NU x x x ina qa-ni la tu-ra-ma gab-bu ina {URU}HAL.ṢU še-ri-bi a-ki ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni e-ta-pa-aš₂ 01 qa {ŠE}IN.NU ša x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni qa-ni la u₂-ra-me x x gab-bu {URU}HAL.ṢU x x x u₂-se-ri-bi x x x x x {ŠE}PAD-MEŠ su-x+x x x x x u₂-se-ri-bi x x x x x in-ta-hu-u-ni x x x x x a-na UN-MEŠ x x x x x x 01 qa {ŠE}PAD-MEŠ x x x x x la tu-rid x x x x x x ma-a a-ta-a x x x x x x ma-a LUGAL x x x x x x ma-a ni-x+x x x x x x x ne₂-pa-aš₂ x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni x x x x x x ma-a is-x x x x x x x KUR-aš-šur ta-x x x x x iš-pur-an-ni x x x x x x a-na {URU}x x x x x x x ša {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x ši-hi-lu x x x x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ x x x x x x UN-ME {URU}ma-lak x x x x x 01-en LU₂ hu-x x x x x x x la iš-ši x x x x x x x i-tal-ku-u-ni x x x x x i-du-lu x+x x x x x x i-tal-ku x+x x x x x x u₂-ma-a x x x x x x ina {URU}x x x x x x ina x x x x x x mi-ni-me-ni TA@v {URU}de-ri la u₂-ṣu 01 qa {ŠE}NUMUN mi-ni-me-ni la e-ru-šu₂ ina UGU-hi {URU}man-di-ri-a.a ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {URU}HAL.ṢU i-si-ka lu-ši-bu ma-a ina UGU-hi-šu₂-nu lu et-ka-ka x x x a-ki-ma a-ki-ma la et-ka-ka la a-za-za EN.NUN ša {URU}HAL.ṢU la a-ṣu-ru la a-mu-a-ta
